name: obsidian-any-block
description: You can flexibility to create a 'Block' by some means.
author: LincZero
license: GNU Affero General Public License v3.0

scripts.build: pnpm copy_abc_style && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.build-min: pnpm copy_abc_style && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.min.mjs production
scripts.ob:build: pnpm copy_abc_style && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.mjs production
scripts.ob:build-min: pnpm copy_abc_style && tsc -noEmit -skipLibCheck && node esbuild.config.min.mjs production
scripts.build2: pnpm copy_abc_style && npx svelte-check && vite build --mode=production
scripts.version: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
scripts.bumpversion: node version-bump.mjs && git add manifest.json versions.json
